title: maestro error message on mac
body: hey guys, since the new update i cant even open LOL, i always have the same error message (There was an error connecting with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client) even after trying every solutions on all forums, it's very frustating. someone have a solution? i fixed it few times easily on a hp pc, but i can figure this on a mac

replies.body:
A big chunk of issues on the Mac Client are related to an unstable connection. This situation is no different, as the Maestro service requires a stable connection and if any drops occur, it can prevent your client from reaching the server. Our [Connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-mac) is the best place to start with this problem.

Let me know if you continue to have Maestro errors.
